item.title: Vector Tiles for Leaflet
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: Install GDAL Tools The GDAL tools are installed from https://www.gisinternals.com/. Install the core with Python applications, which contain some useful raster tools like gdal2tile.py. Alternatively, it can be installed using OSGeo4W. However, OSGeo4W can interfere with PostgreSQL/PostGIS on GDAL for the setting. Therefore, it is not recommended to use OSGeo4W for GDAL. GIS Internals By default, it is installed under C:\Program Files\GDAL. We can start with GDAL specified command terminal C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.
